name: industrial furnace production, coal, 1-10MW | industrial furnace, coal, 1-10MW | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/531/documentation

Lifetime is assumed to be 20 years. No assessment was performed on different types of furnaces.;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]



Average stoker furnace operational in the early 1990s. The module includes materials, energy and transport requirements used for construction of the plant. Disposal of material is also included.
category: C:Manufacturing/28:Manufacture of machinery and equipment n.e.c./281:Manufacture of general-purpose machinery/2815:Manufacture of ovens, furnaces and furnace burners

processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Average used in early 1990s. Stoker boiler used as reference technology.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: see Geography/Text This dataset has been copied from an original dataset covering the geography RER. The uncertainty has been adjusted accordingly.
